attributes.action: Uphold the democratic decision by the people of the U.K. To leave Europe
attributes.additional_details:
Hypothetically speaking if the vote had  gone in favour of the remain camp and thousands of leave campaigners took to the streets they would be labelled racists, xenophobic & many more key defamatory remarks to remove any credence from their argument.
We cannot allow the anarchists to sway the decision just because they make the most noise and are protected under the umbrella of being perfect citizens! Unlike us pro leave voters.
Any politician who votes against the referendum is anti democratic
attributes.background:
The working man is incredibly tired of being  over ruled by the elitist snobs that position themselves in influential positions in the uk. 
The pro eu protests have driven me to write this as they are trying to get their own way through noise & fear.
